# Stories That Lead — Podcast by Vernon Ross
# https://storiesthatlead.com

## About
Stories That Lead is a podcast for communications leaders navigating AI disruption in enterprise environments. Hosted by Vernon Ross, the show features strategic frameworks, real-world case studies, and actionable insights for Fortune 500 communications teams.

## Host
Vernon Ross is an Enterprise Podcaster and communications consultant who helps Fortune 500 teams integrate AI into their workflows. He is the creator of the Micro-Arc Framework (a revelation-based podcast storytelling methodology adapted from Kishōtenketsu) and the Voice Note Blueprint (a voice-first content capture system for leadership teams).

## Core Topics
- AI implementation in corporate communications
- Enterprise podcast production and strategy
- Internal communications transformation
- The Micro-Arc Framework for storytelling
- The Voice Note Blueprint for leadership content
- Communications team workflow optimization

## Key Frameworks
1. The Micro-Arc Framework: A four-act storytelling structure (Ki-Shō-Ten-Ketsu) adapted for enterprise podcast production. Structures narrative around revelation instead of conflict.
2. The Voice Note Blueprint: A structured system for turning executive voice notes into polished podcast episodes and leadership content.

## Tagline
Not Conflict. Revelation.
